<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_customerservice.CSMRelationshipTables</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>A choice script definition for "sn_customerservice_responsibility_access_config.applies_to_relationship" field. Returns the relationship tables to select from the "Applies to relationship" field in the "Responsibility Access Configuration" table; Includes the related party tables and all their child tables.</description> <name>CSMRelationshipTables</name> <script><![CDATA[var CSMRelationshipTables = Class.create(); CSMRelationshipTables.prototype = { initialize: function() {},
/* * Function which restricts the Tables which will be shown in the configuration */ process: function() { return new global.CSManagementUtils().getRelationshipTables(); },
type: 'CSMRelationshipTables' }; ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-02-22 15:05:23</sys_created_on> <sys_id>21e17aef43c12110911baf56aab8f2bd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>CSMRelationshipTables</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Customer Service" source="sn_customerservice">51d811fad7223100b7490ee60e61034f</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service">51d811fad7223100b7490ee60e61034f</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_21e17aef43c12110911baf56aab8f2bd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-10 07:05:08</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
